description: Update a job production plan display unit of measure
permissions: Allowed when the user is authorized to update the related job production plan via JobProductionPlanDisplayUnitOfMeasurePolicy (delegated to JobProductionPlanPolicy).
side_effects: Updates the job production plan display unit of measure record.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one field to update is required; only importance position is supported. Importance position is a 0-based index.

flags.name: --importance-position
flags.description: Update the importance position (0-based index). Example: --importance-position 1.
flags.validation: 0-based index. At least one field must be provided for update.
